title: Panzanella (Tuscan tomato and bread salad)
description: Simon Hopkinson's classic panzanella recipe captures the fruity flavours of the Mediterranean.Each serving provides 200kcal,	4g protein, 19g carbohydrate (of which 5g sugars), 11g fat (of which 1.5g saturates),	 2.5g fibre and	0.3g salt.
ingredients: 5 handfuls chunks of stale sourdough or other bread
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 medium-sized cucumber, peeled, cut into small chunks
